projects.title: TankUP PWA
projects.desc:
Proof of concept filterable, sortable listing of Queensland fuel price index.
Find lowest price/closest or combined option to tank up, add your private by brand discounts and more.
Location based app - works only in Queensland, Australia.

projects.title: This portfolio/resume site
projects.desc: Written in plain JS, taking advatnage of native browser web components.

projects.title: WebGPU - game of life simulation
projects.desc: Modified version of google codelabs (Conway's Game of Life simulation) that runs entirely on GPU using the WebGPU.

projects.title: Twitch clips to vertical shorts "smart" conversion
projects.desc: Downloading twitch.tv clips based on config (views count treshhold, selected channels, selected categories) Converting 16: 9 to 9: 16 (vertical) video - shorts format (eg. tiktok) Detecting streamer camera / face recognition, scaling up and puting above full screen clip. Bruning custom logo across the video legth.

projects.title: Drvcheck - drive statistic tool
projects.desc: Drvcheck is golang written wrapper around unix "df" command which store drives statistics.

positions.title: Full-Stack Developer - Beauty Company
positions.subtitle: (Custom E-Commerce platform)
descList: Worked with RESTful APIs and integrated third-party services
Created and maintained materialized views to pre-aggregate data and improve query performance
Implemented and maintained MySQL table indexes to improve query performance and speed up data retrieval
Implemented features such as authentication, authorization, data validation, and CRUD operations
Provided technical support and troubleshooting for production environments
Troubleshooted and debugged code to fix issues and improve application performance
Used techniques such as lazy loading to reduce the number of requests made to the server and improve page performance
Utilized Redis caching with PHP to reduce server load and improve response times
